about.title: Making property photos
about.subtitle: Emlak is an AI-powered photo enhancement platform built specifically for real estate professionals. We help agents, photographers, and property managers create stunning visuals that sell properties faster.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: We started Emlak because we saw a gap in the market. Real estate professionals needed high-quality photo enhancement, but existing solutions were either too expensive, too slow, or required technical expertise.
story.p2: Professional photography services can cost hundreds of dollars per property and take days to deliver. DIY editing tools require hours of learning and manual work. Neither option works when you have multiple listings and tight deadlines.
story.p3: Emlak bridges this gap. Our AI understands real estate photography. It knows how to brighten rooms, enhance curb appeal, and make properties look their absolute best. All automatically, in seconds.
story.p4: Today, we've processed over 50,000 images for real estate professionals across Norway. Our users report up to 85% higher engagement on their listings. And we're just getting started.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.desc: Every image we process meets professional standards. We never compromise on the output quality.

speed.title: Speed Matters
speed.desc: Real estate moves fast. Our AI delivers results in seconds, not hours or days.

builtForYou.title: Built for You
builtForYou.desc: Designed specifically for real estate professionals. Every feature solves a real problem.

simplePricing.title: Simple Pricing
simplePricing.desc: No subscriptions, no hidden fees. Pay only for what you use, when you use it.

mission.title: Empowering real estate professionals
mission.desc: Our mission is to democratize professional-quality real estate photography. We believe every property deserves to be presented at its best, regardless of budget or technical expertise. By harnessing the power of AI, we make this possible for everyone.

cta.title: Want to learn more?
cta.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have questions about our service or just want to say hello, get in touch.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

response.title: Response time
response.value: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

help.title: How can we help?
help.subtitle: Search our knowledge base or browse categories below
help.noResultsDesc: Try a different search term or browse categories below

cta.title: Still need help?
cta.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: Emlak ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered real estate photo enhancement service.
intro.p2: By using Emlak, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies, please do not use our service.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.p1: We collect information that you provide directly to us:

list.account: Account Information: Name, email address, and password when you create an account.
list.payment: Payment Information: Billing details processed securely through our payment provider. We do not store your full credit card information.
list.images: Images: Photos you upload for AI enhancement. These are processed and stored temporarily to deliver our service.
list.usage: Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our service, including features used and processing preferences.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.p1: We use the information we collect to:

list.provide: Provide, maintain, and improve our AI photo enhancement service
list.process: Process your transactions and send related information
list.communicate: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
list.respond: Respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
list.analyze: Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities
list.prevent: Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activity

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
storage.p1: Your data is stored securely on servers located in the European Economic Area (EEA). We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
storage.p2: Uploaded images are stored temporarily for processing and delivery. You may request deletion of your images at any time through your account settings or by contacting us.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.p1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

list.providers: Service Providers: With third-party vendors who assist us in operating our service (e.g., cloud hosting, payment processing).
list.legal: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to respond to legal process.
list.business: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.p1: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

list.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data.
list.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data.
list.portability: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service.
list.objection: Objection: Object to processing of your personal data.

rights.p2: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@emlak.plus.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.p1: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our service. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

retention.title: 8. Data Retention
retention.p1: We retain your account information for as long as your account is active. Uploaded images are retained for 30 days after processing to allow for re-downloads, after which they are automatically deleted. You may request earlier deletion at any time.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our service

intro.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
intro.p1: By accessing or using Emlak ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the Service.
intro.p2: These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.p1: Emlak provides AI-powered photo enhancement and video creation services for real estate professionals. Our service allows you to upload property images, apply AI enhancements, and generate professional marketing materials.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.p1: To use certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:

list.accurate: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
list.update: Maintain and promptly update your account information
list.security: Maintain the security of your password and account
list.responsibility: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
list.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

payment.title: 4. Payment and Pricing
payment.p1: Emlak operates on a pay-per-use model. Current pricing is as follows:
payment.p2: Prices are subject to change with reasonable notice. All payments are processed securely through our payment provider. Payments are non-refundable except as outlined in our refund policy.

refund.title: 5. Refund Policy
refund.p1: If you are not satisfied with the results of our AI processing, you may request a refund within 24 hours of the processing completion. Refund requests should be submitted to info@emlak.plus with your order details and reason for dissatisfaction.
refund.p2: We reserve the right to deny refund requests that we determine, in our sole discretion, to be fraudulent or abusive.

content.title: 6. User Content
content.p1: You retain ownership of all images and content you upload to the Service.
content.p2: By uploading content, you grant us a limited license to:

list.process: Process and enhance your images using our AI technology
list.store: Store your content temporarily to deliver the Service
list.derivative: Create derivative works (enhanced images) for your use

content.p3: You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to upload and use the content, and that your content does not violate any third-party rights.

ip.title: 7. Intellectual Property
ip.p1: The Service, including its original content, features, and functionality, is owned by Emlak and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
ip.p2: Enhanced images produced by our Service are owned by you, subject to any underlying rights in the original images.

prohibited.title: 8. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.p1: You agree not to use the Service to:

list.rights: Upload content that you do not have the right to use
list.illegal: Upload illegal, harmful, or objectionable content
list.access: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Service
list.interfere: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
list.fraud: Use the Service for any fraudulent or deceptive purposes
list.violate: Violate any applicable laws or regulations

liability.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
liability.p1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Emlak shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from:

list.usage: Your use or inability to use the Service
list.unauthorized: Any unauthorized access to or use of our servers
list.interruption: Any interruption or cessation of transmission to or from the Service
list.bugs: Any bugs, viruses, or other harmful code transmitted through the Service

liability.p2: Our total liability for any claims under these terms shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim.

warranty.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
warranty.p1: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
warranty.p2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that any defects will be corrected.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.p1: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.
termination.p2: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us. Upon termination, we will delete your account data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

governing.title: 12. Governing Law
governing.p1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Norway, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of Norway.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.p1: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
changes.p2: By continuing to access or use our Service after revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

pricingPage.heroSubtitle: Pay per project. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.
pricingPage.readyToStartDesc: Transform your property photos today. No credit card required to try.

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: We charge per project, not per month. For photo enhancement, you pay 1000 NOK per property (up to 20 images). For video creation, you pay 1000 NOK per video. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.

items.question: What image formats do you support?
items.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WEBP. Maximum file size is 10MB per image. Enhanced images are delivered in high-resolution JPG format.

items.question: How long does processing take?
items.answer: Photo enhancement typically takes under 30 seconds per image. Video creation usually takes 5-10 minutes depending on the number of images and selected options.

items.question: Can I try before I buy?
items.answer: Yes! New users get free credits to try out the platform. You can enhance a few images to see the quality before committing to a full property project.

items.question: What if I have more than 20 images?
items.answer: If your property has more than 20 images, you can create multiple projects or contact us for custom pricing on larger shoots.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: If you're not satisfied with the results, contact us within 24 hours of processing and we'll work with you to make it right or provide a refund.
